template.subject: New exam post
template.body:
Dear %FIRSTNAME% %LASTNAME%,
A new exam code has just been created for you in Rp-Now, your exam code is %EXAM_CODE%
You can download the RP-Now by clicking the following link:
%RP_NOW_URL%
If you require any assistance with this system, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Sincerely, %CREATOR_FIRSTNAME% %CREATOR_LASTNAME% %CREATOR_EMAIL%
